Text: 13 fights on this card & ONLY 4 make it to torrents... thanks for the up, but what's the point if less than 25% is available? Any 10 year old with a VCR or DVR could get this much... You're good at what you do, but can't you get someone on getting all of the fights for a UFC event??

Sorry about 33%. Think of how you'd feel if a big chunk of a movie was just not there, especially from the middle of the film... people would be pissed. +1 for what is here, but it would be nice to see the other 9 fights too. :)
